t: Exchange Offer - Frequently Asked Questions - Amazon Customer Service
s: Exchange offer and the proposed exchange value of used product is provided by third-party exchange partners. The offer may vary depending on the brand and model selected, your delivery location and availability of the offer by the exchange partner at the time of placing the order.

t: What is an ad exchange? Here’s everything you need to know
s: September 9, 2022 - An ad exchange can give publishers and advertisers control over inventory by defining the location, format, content, and budget of placements. Additionally, ad exchanges can give buyers the ability to apply brand safety mechanisms and reach an audience across multiple publishers and formats.
